thread.title: Anger as New York City Public Housing Residents Go Without Heat, Hot Water

author: Mara Gay
title: Anger as New York City Public Housing Residents Go Without Heat, Hot Water

organizations.name: new york city public housing residents go without heat

text:
More than 143,000, or 80%, of New York City’s 175,000 public housing apartments have been without heat or hot water at times this winter, city officials said Tuesday.
Tempers flared over widespread heat and hot water outages in New York City public housing at an unusually contentious City Council hearing. Some residents were in tears. Lawmakers said they had lost confidence in Mayor Bill de Blasio’s public housing chairwoman, Shola Olatoye.
